mapper.select:
SELECT DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho.*, DbT5102NinteiKekkaJoho.*, DbT5105NinteiKanryoJoho.*, DbT5115Image.*, DbT5116IchijiHanteiKekkaJoho.*, DbT5120ShinseitodokedeJoho.*, DbT5121ShinseiRirekiJoho.*, DbT5122TsuchishoHakkoJoho.*, DbT5123NinteiKeikakuJoho.*, DbT5129TennyuShibo.*, DbT5150RenrakusakiJoho.*, DbT5510IchiGojiHanteiKekkaJoho.*, DbT5590ShinsakaiIinJogaiJoho.*
FROM ( SELECT
FROM rgdb."DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho" WHERE "shinseishoKanriNo"=#{shinseishoKanriNo} ) AS DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho LEFT JOIN ( SELECT
FROM rgdb."DbT5102NinteiKekkaJoho" ) AS DbT5102NinteiKekkaJoho ON DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho."dbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho_shinseishoKanriNo" = DbT5102NinteiKekkaJoho."dbT5102NinteiKekkaJoho_shinseishoKanriNo" INNER JOIN ( SELECT
FROM rgdb."DbT5105NinteiKanryoJoho") AS DbT5105NinteiKanryoJoho ON DbT5102NinteiKekkaJoho."dbT5102NinteiKekkaJoho_shinseishoKanriNo" = DbT5105NinteiKanryoJoho."dbT5105NinteiKanryoJoho_shinseishoKanriNo" INNER JOIN ( SELECT
FROM rgdb."DbT5115Image") AS DbT5115Image ON DbT5105NinteiKanryoJoho."dbT5105NinteiKanryoJoho_shinseishoKanriNo" = DbT5115Image."dbT5115Image_shinseishoKanriNo" INNER JOIN ( SELECT
FROM rgdb."DbT5116IchijiHanteiKekkaJoho") AS DbT5116IchijiHanteiKekkaJoho ON DbT5115Image."dbT5115Image_shinseishoKanriNo" = DbT5116IchijiHanteiKekkaJoho."dbT5116IchijiHanteiKekkaJoho_shinseishoKanriNo" INNER JOIN ( SELECT
FROM rgdb."DbT5120ShinseitodokedeJoho") AS DbT5120ShinseitodokedeJoho ON DbT5116IchijiHanteiKekkaJoho."dbT5116IchijiHanteiKekkaJoho_shinseishoKanriNo" = DbT5120ShinseitodokedeJoho."dbT5120ShinseitodokedeJoho_shinseishoKanriNo" INNER JOIN ( SELECT
FROM rgdb."DbT5121ShinseiRirekiJoho") AS DbT5121ShinseiRirekiJoho ON DbT5120ShinseitodokedeJoho."dbT5120ShinseitodokedeJoho_shinseishoKanriNo" = DbT5121ShinseiRirekiJoho."dbT5121ShinseiRirekiJoho_shinseishoKanriNo" INNER JOIN ( SELECT
FROM rgdb."DbT5122TsuchishoHakkoJoho") AS DbT5122TsuchishoHakkoJoho ON DbT5121ShinseiRirekiJoho."dbT5121ShinseiRirekiJoho_shinseishoKanriNo" = DbT5122TsuchishoHakkoJoho."dbT5122TsuchishoHakkoJoho_shinseishoKanriNo" INNER JOIN ( SELECT
FROM rgdb."DbT5123NinteiKeikakuJoho") AS DbT5123NinteiKeikakuJoho ON DbT5122TsuchishoHakkoJoho."dbT5122TsuchishoHakkoJoho_shinseishoKanriNo" = DbT5123NinteiKeikakuJoho."dbT5123NinteiKeikakuJoho_shinseishoKanriNo" INNER JOIN ( SELECT
FROM rgdb."DbT5129TennyuShibo" ) AS DbT5129TennyuShibo ON DbT5123NinteiKeikakuJoho."dbT5123NinteiKeikakuJoho_shinseishoKanriNo" = DbT5129TennyuShibo."dbT5129TennyuShibo_shinseishoKanriNo" INNER JOIN ( SELECT
FROM rgdb."DbT5150RenrakusakiJoho") AS DbT5150RenrakusakiJoho ON DbT5129TennyuShibo."dbT5129TennyuShibo_shinseishoKanriNo" = DbT5150RenrakusakiJoho."dbT5150RenrakusakiJoho_shinseishoKanriNo" INNER JOIN ( SELECT
FROM rgdb."DbT5510IchiGojiHanteiKekkaJoho") AS DbT5510IchiGojiHanteiKekkaJoho ON DbT5150RenrakusakiJoho."dbT5150RenrakusakiJoho_shinseishoKanriNo" = DbT5510IchiGojiHanteiKekkaJoho."dbT5510IchiGojiHanteiKekkaJoho_shinseishoKanriNo" INNER JOIN ( SELECT
FROM rgdb."DbT5590ShinsakaiIinJogaiJoho") AS DbT5590ShinsakaiIinJogaiJoho ON DbT5510IchiGojiHanteiKekkaJoho."dbT5510IchiGojiHanteiKekkaJoho_shinseishoKanriNo" = DbT5590ShinsakaiIinJogaiJoho."dbT5590ShinsakaiIinJogaiJoho_shinseishoKanriNo"

collection.property: 要介護認定一次判定結果情報Entity
要介護認定1_5次判定結果情報Entity
